prizeListMission1:
Wildcard Missions are quick-fire, intense crime-fighting missions not listed on the schedule.

They are only for the most skilled Crime Fighter.

Are you up to the job!?
emailMission1: Here is some text setting out what the WildCard Mission is all about. Testing Free.
revealcluesMission1: TEST TEST TEST TEST TEST TEST TEST TEST

intro:
This is your first clue, Crime Fighter.

Good luck finding the Viper. The whole of London is depending on you!
